H0.text: The age of the continents was used by Alfred Wegener as evidence that Earth's continental landmasses had drifted apart over time.

H2.text: The thickness of the continents was used by Alfred Wegener as evidence that Earth's continental landmasses had drifted apart over time.

H3.text: The composition of the continents was used by Alfred Wegener as evidence that Earth's continental landmasses had drifted apart over time.

A4.text: The shapes of continents on opposite sides of the Atlantic Ocean (most notably, Africa and South America) seem to fit together.
